properties.areaDesc: Shelby, AL; Elmore, AL; Talladega, AL; Chilton, AL; Coosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 8:32PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Coosa River At Childersburg...

.A Flood Warning continues at Childersburg due to expected rainfall
amounts between 2 and 4 inches through the day on Tuesday. Additional
rainfall is possible through the end of this upcoming week which
will cause water levels to remain elevated or increase further.
Interests should closely monitor the latest river forecasts through
the upcoming week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Coosa River At Childersburg.
* until further notice...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT 7:45 PM Sunday the stage was 402.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 402 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 404.8 feet by
early Tuesday afternoon.
* Impact...At 402 feet...Flooding of low lying areas begins. At 404
feet flooding of some low lying roads in the area begins...and the
yards of some homes near the river become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
